mapper.select: select S.uuid, S.dir, S.name AS sm_name, SG.grno, SG.name AS sg_name, SG.detail, SG.city, SG.county, C.code from smallgroup SG left join category C on C.ctno = SG.ctno left join sgmain S on S.grno = SG.grno where C.code = #{code}
select * from category join smallgroup on category.ctno = smallgroup.ctno where category.name = #{name}
select name from category where code = #{code}
select code from category where name = #{name}
